job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: job descriptionltbrgtltbrgt experienced and fully engaged in software development life cycle sdlcltbrgt design code and debug applications in various software languagesltbrgt experience in a technical role such as software engineer solutions engineer or similar ltbrgt knowledge on code analysis requirements analysis software review identification of code metrics system risk analysis software reliability analysisltbrgt good communication skills and ability to articulate tech issues accurately and succinctly in a manner that business users can understand and supportltbrgt azure knowledge is an added advantageltbrgt experience in production support and customer interactionltbrgt delivers professional services to sound technical business and professional standards while ensuring strong customer satisfaction and success ltbrgt provides technical design and construction expertise to customer implementations and deploymentsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt time of operation this track will be in x shift model therefore candidates should be flexible to cover during holidays and weekends to accommodate ms rosterltbrgt
